title: Blood test could give two month warning of kidney transplant rejection

title_detail.value: Blood test could give two month warning of kidney transplant rejection

summary: New research has found a way to predict rejection of a kidney transplant before it happens, by monitoring the immune system of transplant patients.

summary_detail.value: New research has found a way to predict rejection of a kidney transplant before it happens, by monitoring the immune system of transplant patients.
